code_events.event:
Called when a XF\Mvc\Router object is constructed to manipulate routes

Callback signature:

\SV\StandardLib\Repository\LinkBuilder $linkBuilder, \XF\Mvc\Router $router

Arguments:

  1. \SV\StandardLib\Repository\LinkBuilder $linkBuilder - The link builder repository with methods to manipulate the current router object.
  2. \XF\Mvc\Router $router - The router object that is in the middle of being constructed.

Event hint should match the \XF::app()->container('app.classType') output.
Known event hints:

  1. Cli
  2. Admin
  3. Api
  4. Pub
